titleStmt.title: Death made comfortable, or, The way to dye well consisting of directions for an holy and an happy death : together with an office for the sick and for certain kinds of bodily illness, and for dying persons, and proper prayers upon the death of friends / by John Kettlewell ...
titleStmt.author: Kettlewell, John, 1653-1695.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Kettlewell, and are to be sold by Sam. Keble ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
